body.p: Important updates and how to prevent running into problems when running along are at the center of this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, followed by plenty of other interesting news. A Spanish project using Gentoo for embedded devices, the Dane behind the Gentoo bugday, and a memorable Gentoo social event in Japan give this week's edition an even more international flair than usual, and most of that's not even from the International section. Which is of course there, too, as are the press clippings, staff news, very little security and the traditional bugzilla statistics. Enjoy!
